module.name: CallerID Lookup
module.description: Allows CallerID Lookup of incoming calls against different sources (OpenCNAM, MySQL, HTTP, ENUM, Phonebook Module)
module.changelog: *15.0.27* FREEPBX-23954 *15.0.26* FREEPBX-23954 *15.0.25* FREEPBX-23578 CallerID Lookup Module No Longer Passing Default Caller ID Through *15.0.24* FREEPBX-23429 CallerID Lookup after update doesn't substitute [NUMBER] *15.0.23* FREEI-4692 *15.0.22* FREEI-4682 *15.0.21* FREEPBX-23206 CID Lookup module relies on app_mysql *15.0.20* Packaging of ver 15.0.20 *15.0.19* Packaging of ver 15.0.19 *15.0.18* Packaging of ver 15.0.18 *15.0.17* FREEI-1667 modify cidlookup & adding delAction class *15.0.16* FREEI-1397 To avoid duplicate entry of cidlookup *15.0.15* Feature/FREEPBX-21165 *15.0.14* Fix whitespace for test release. *15.0.13* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.12* FREEPBX-20106 Backup and restoring the CID Lookup module is adding a junk entry. *15.0.11* FREEPBX-20004 Not able to select the Contact Manager Groups in CID lookup sources. *15.0.10* FREEPBX-20117 Unable to edit CallerID Lookup entry in FreePBX 15. *15.0.9* FREEPBX-19791 *15.0.8* FREEPBX-19709 CID lookup to Contact Mgr returns 'unknown' instead of nothing *15.0.7* Fixing FREEPBX-18685 CallerId Lookup does not urlencode plus(+) sign *15.0.6* fixing legacy restore *15.0.5* FREEPBX-18193 Fix core hook to DID *15.0.4* FREEPBX-18193 Fix CRUD actions *15.0.3* FREEPBX-18139 *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* FreePBX 15 updates
